rounds.pro_tip: ATMOSPHERIC DEPTH: Real landscapes show natural haze and gradual color shifts toward the horizon. AI often renders distant mountains too sharply or with artificial color banding.
UNCANNY PERFECTION: This image has a 'too clean' quality. Real photos have sensor noise, slight motion blur, and chromatic aberration. AI images are often suspiciously pristine.
FUR REALITY CHECK: Real animal fur has individual hairs catching light at different angles, creating natural randomness. AI fur tends to look like a uniform texture painted on.
PHYSICS VIOLATIONS: Check reflections, shadows, and gravity. AI frequently places light sources inconsistently ‚Äî shadows may point in conflicting directions across the same scene.

rounds.attribution: Real photograph ‚Äî fresh vegetables and food styling
rounds.pro_tip: ORGANIC CHAOS: Real food has natural imperfections ‚Äî a leaf slightly wilted, sauce dripped asymmetrically, crumbs scattered randomly. AI food photography looks suspiciously art-directed.
BOUNDARY ARTIFACTS: Zoom into where hair meets the background or skin meets fabric. AI creates subtle smearing, impossible blending, or haloing effects at these transitions.
TEXTURE AT SCALE: Real textures are consistent when you zoom in ‚Äî wood grain, leaf veins, fabric weave all hold up. AI textures often dissolve into meaningless noise at close inspection.
TEXT IS THE TELL: Any text, signage, or lettering in an AI image is almost always garbled. Look for nonsensical words, impossible letter forms, or characters that shift between styles.

SENSOR FINGERPRINT: Real photos have consistent noise patterns from the camera sensor. AI images have unnaturally clean skies next to hyper-detailed foregrounds ‚Äî an impossible combination for real cameras.
REPETITION PATTERNS: Count similar elements (leaves, bricks, clouds). AI creates subtle copy-paste repetition that nature never produces. Real scenes have true randomness in repeating elements.
